title: 즉흥적 의견 - 경험적 판단
description: 개인 경험을 바탕으로 한 즉흥적 판단을 자연스럽게 표현하는 원어민 수준의 의견을 구사합니다.
examples: In my experience, these things usually don't work out.
I've tried something similar before, and it wasn't easy.
I've seen situations like this many times, and they usually end this way.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 경험적 판단 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 내 경험상, 이런 건 보통 잘 안 돼.
sentences.en: In my experience, these things usually don't work out.

sentences.kr: 전에 비슷한 걸 해봤는데, 쉽지 않더라.
sentences.en: I've tried something similar before, and it wasn't easy.

sentences.kr: 이런 상황 많이 봤는데, 대부분 이렇게 끝나.
sentences.en: I've seen situations like this many times, and they usually end this way.
Speaking from experience, this is the moment to act.

sentences.kr: 예전에 당해본 적이 있어서, 바로 알아차렸어.
sentences.en: I've been through this before, so I recognized it right away.

sentences.kr: 이런 패턴은 뻔해. 다음에 뭐가 올지 알겠어.
sentences.en: This pattern is predictable. I know what's coming next.

sentences.kr: 과거 경험을 보면, 지금이 결정적인 순간이야.
sentences.en: Based on past experience, this is the critical moment.

sentences.kr: 한번 겪어봤으니까, 이번엔 다르게 접근해야 해.
sentences.en: Since I've been through it once, I need to approach it differently this time.
